Articles.Content:
WissX's Conquor
 

What is it?

It is a forum game where you try and use military tactics to Conqueror the earth

RULES

NO NUKING

MUST BE REALISTIC someone really small can not take over a HUGE country with a few moves

You should role-play each move

You may use planned military concepts. Like some weapons that were not made or could not happen

Have Fun!

You also decides what happens within and go to the aid of natural incidents that I may cause.

How to Join/Claim Land

You will be able to claim parts of the Kerbol universe later on.

FIll this out

Country/Area taking (USA must pick a state, Russia do off of districts):

Leader Name:

Country name:

Kind of government:

Population density (# people per KM/Mile):

How to alliance someone

You simply put: I(Leader Name) of (Country name) would like to (Ally/Truce/Surrender/Declare War/Declare Neutrality/Make A Diplomatic Union/ insert more) with (Country Names)

To accept or deny: I (Deny/Accept) (Country names)'s (Ally/Truce/Surrender/Declare War/Declare Neutrality/Make A Diplomatic Union/ insert more).

 

ASK ME QUESTIONS

I RESERVE THE RIGHT TO DECLARE ACTIONS NOT APPROPRIATE AND TO CREATE RULES

I am the "UN" I will play along but wont be a big country

 

Edited February 18, 2016 by wissx
Roleplay is expressly forbidden by rule 2.2j of our Community Guidelines. Locked.
